Text: Thanks Nepotu. As always I'll seed as much and as long as my connection and cap allows.

Thank you mma4me! You are the only one who understand why we are all here. Sometimes I think: worth it? I uploaded Moto GP and this, and with Moto GP I finished because I haven't seen one people only to seed. Then worth it? No, for sure. Also will see what I have to do with NBA Finals.

I know where you are coming from Nepotu. This is a P2P environment. IF NO ONE SHARES (SEEDS) THEN NOBODY GETS ANYTHING. 

Please people, SEED what you can, every little bit helps everyone. Think of it as returning a favour.
Thanks for your help, mma4me! You're one of the good guys.
